title: BRIEF-Mineral Resources Updates On FIRB Approval For Wodgina Transaction
text:
BRIEF-Mineral Resources Updates On FIRB Approval For Wodgina Transaction

Commodities 47 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 17:49)

BRIEF-Mineral Resources Updates On FIRB Approval For Wodgina Transaction Oct 28 (Reuters) - Mineral Resources Ltd : * ALBEMARLE CORPORATION NOTIFIED THAT FIRB HAS NO OBJECTION TO ITS ACQUISITION OF A 60% INTEREST IN WODGINA LITHIUM PROJECT * MINERAL RESOURCES LTD UPDATES ON FIRB APPROVAL FOR WODGINA TRANSACTION

BRIEF-Mineral Resources Updates On FIRB Approval For Wodgina Transaction
